input_text.Prompt:
Using the item specifications and item specification, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item specification:
Culinary 2116 Universal Mini Microphone with Omnidirectional Stereo Mic for Phone, Singing

Item specifications:
IT CAN BE USED IN THE FOLLOWING APPLICATIONS:SMULE SING,YOUTUBE,AUDACITY,SEESAW,BOOK CREATOR,SKYPE,TIK TOK ETC
Don't need batteries, easy to carry and collect suitable for the most of cellphones
It can be compatible with multi Singing software, and lets you have a good Singing experience
Do not charge the phone when the dsc of a microphone, otherwise there will be current sound.
Perfect surface spray processing technology
Just plug and record, anytime anywhere without external power Supply.
 light weight, high quality, easy to take along
It can be compatible with multi singing software, and lets you have a good singing experience.

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Introducing the Culinary 2116 Universal Mini Microphone - the ultimate singing companion for your mobile device! 🎤

Attention: Are you tired of using a subpar microphone for your singing recordings? Do you struggle with background noise and poor sound quality? Look no further than the Culinary 2116!

Interest: This revolutionary microphone is designed specifically for singing, with an omnidirectional stereo mic that captures your voice with crystal clarity. It's perfect for recording on your phone, tablet, or computer, and is compatible with a wide range of singing software including SMULE SING, YouTube, Audacity, SeeSaw, Book Creator, Skype, and more! 🎵

Desire: Imagine having a professional-quality singing experience anytime, anywhere - without the need for external power or batteries! The Culinary 2116 is lightweight, easy to carry, and features a sleek, compact design that fits seamlessly into your purse, backpack, or pocket. Plus, with our advanced surface spray processing technology, you can enjoy a premium recording experience without any unwanted background noise. 💖

Action: Ready to take your singing to the next level? Order the Culinary 2116 Universal Mini Microphone today and start recording like a pro! 🎧👉 Click the link in our bio to purchase now, and get ready to shine with your next viral performance! 💫 #Culinary2116 #SingingMicrophone #MobileRecording #ProfessionalSound
input_text.Response B: The Culinary 2116 Universal Mini Microphone with Omnidirectional Stereo Mic for Phone, Singing is a high-quality microphone that is compatible with a wide range of devices. It features a wide dynamic range, high signal-to-noise ratio, and low distortion, making it perfect for karaoke, singing, and voice recording. The microphone is also easy to use, lightweight, and portable, making it perfect for on-the-go use. It can be used with various applications such as SMULE Sing, YouTube, Audacity, Seesaw, Book Creator, Skype, Tik Tok, etc. This microphone is compatible with most smartphones and tablets, making it a versatile and useful tool for entertainment and productivity purposes. It is a great accessory for music enthusiasts, content creators, and audio professionals.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
